content:
You're correct, my apologies for the oversight. Since you've already set up a wildcard subdomain, you don't need to add the custom domain `docs.danfletcher.com` to the list of domains for your Gitbook project on Vercel.

Instead, Dan can simply create a CNAME record for `docs.danfletcher.com` in his DNS settings that points to `dans-gitbook.vercel.app`. After the DNS changes propagate, Dan's documentation site should be accessible via the custom domain `docs.danfletcher.com` without any further configuration needed on the Vercel side.

Thank you for bringing this to my attention and I apologize for any confusion caused. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns!
